A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very pretty\, substance-less film... I understand the director tried something new with this film but it never fully lives up to any of it's ambitious goals. Instead\, it fails on many fronts\, most notably characters who meander about with no clear direction or purpose. True\, the purpose of the film was\, \"to learn from failure\,\" but when I spend an entire movie watching characters fail repeatedly\, I don't feel like waiting for the next movie until I see them \"learn\" anything
